title: ShelfCompanyCryptoReady
author: ShelfCompanyCryptoReady
content: UK SHELF COMPANY FOR SALEFinancial Asset: UK LTD CompanyYear of Registration: 2012Active UK Bank Account: Since 2012New Crypto Accounts: Coinbase / Binance / KrakenBypass the time, expense, and difficulties of setting up a new company from scratch, including the challenge of obtaining a UK bank account for a new crypto business.Acquire an 11-year-old UK-based company with an active UK business bank account and clean crypto exchange accounts.Benefits of acquiring this company:- Time savings- Reduced bureaucratic hurdles- Easier access to banking & exchange services- Highly suitable solution for non-UK citizens/residents- Established clean historyPreviously involved in IT management services, this well-maintained company with a single UK citizen owner (director & 100% shareholder) since inception has no debts, creditors, or legal issues, making it ideal for entrepreneurs in the crypto industry.Optional extra bank accounts via Payoneer (National Australia Bank / DirectCash Bank Canada / MUFG Bank Japan / CitiBank Ireland / Citibank Singapore).We have maintained full regulatory compliance, ensuring a smooth acquisition process. Our registered accountant will assist with the entire transfer process, ensuring a seamless transition for the new owner.For obvious reasons, interested buyers will be required to complete an identity verification process through ComplyCube (complycube.com), a trusted third-party UK-based identity verification platform, before receiving any further information.Price: Only 2 BTC
